article: the chairwoman of the community board that voted for an islamic center and mosque near the world trade center site said she believes adding an interfaith dimension would help unite people , saying a nondenominational chapel built at the pentagon as part of a sept. ## memorial did just that .
abstract: nyc community board head wants interfaith center
